channel.title: Webclient
channel.description: Someone please help me make a webclient for a hybridpvp server project insanity , i use www.rswebclients.com for my webclient, but i get ddosed alot! so now i wanna make my own webclient on my website so they can't find my server ip in the page source. Thanks alot guys appreciate it.

item.title: Webclient
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

My post on another recent thread:

Here is a good tutorial to help you: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=449295.0 [b]The tutorial with fixed links:[/b] http://www.run3-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/253018-how-make-your-project-insanity-client-webclient.html (replace the [b]3[/b] with an [b]e[/b])

If your auto-cache downloader is already working, download this and follow this.

If you want your no-ip address to be more secure, only give out .jar’s of your client - this way people cannot get to your ip as easily.

Also on top lists use a seperate no-ip address that is also pointing to the computer you are hosting on - this way it will still detect uptime, and people will not be able to DDoS the correct address.

Read full topic
